name.en: Theory and Practice of Creativity and Multiple Intelligence
name.ch: 創造力與多元智慧的理念與實踐

goal.en: "First, the teaching objectives:1. Understanding the theory of creativity.2. Recognizing the multiple intelligences theory, eight intelligence representatives.3. The concept of multiple intelligences and creativity applied in everyday life.4. be able to guide the students creativity and multiple intelligences idea in professional learning."
goal.ch: "一、教學目標：1.認識創造力相關理論。2.認識多元智慧理論、八大智慧、代表人物。3.將多元智慧與創造力理念應用在日常生活中。4.引導同學能將創造力與多元智慧理念運用在專業學習中。"

grading.en: "1. 40% of the lectures (1) 10% attendance (absence of a point deduction, twice a semester may request leave). (2) job 10% (LMS learning platform upload job next week, school day at noon, every job to 10 points, 5 points paid on time, every Questions are answered 5 minutes, end of period average). (3) 10% single classroom (before each class the teacher made A4 piece of paper, write down the questions and answers classroom interaction, handed in the classroom, each paid to 1 Points, end of period average). (4) 10% of the panel discussion (the discussion of randomized groups of four across the department, the teacher made a A4 paper, one President, one record, 2 people Station to the whiteboard and draw reports, examine the results of signatures handed in group discussions, each to one point, the students were the top three vote plus 1 point). 2. The interim report of 30% (15% of the oral report - Innovation 10%, 5% practical, 15% of the written report of five parts, each of which accounted for 3%). 3. The final report 30% (10% of innovative design, oral presentations 10% (5% of expression, content production 5%), a written report of five parts by 10% Each part 2%). 4. Final exam 10% (bonus question, quiz 10 questions, each question one point)."
grading.ch: "1.平時上課40% （1）出席10%（缺席一次扣一分,一學期可請2次假）。 (2)作業10%（LMS學習平台上傳作業,下周上課日中午截止，每次作業給10分,準時繳交5分,每 題皆回答5分,期末平均) 。 (3)課堂學習單10%(每次上課前老師發A4紙一張,寫下課堂互動問答, 下課時繳回,每次繳交給1 分,期末平均)。 (4)小組討論10%(討論時隨機分組,四人一組跨科系,老師發A4紙一張,1人主席、1人記錄、2人上 台至白板繪製與報告，審視簽名繳回小組討論結果，每次給1分，同學投票前三名者另加1分) 。 2.期中報告30%(口頭報告15%-創新佔10%、實用佔5%，書面報告五個部分15%，每個部分佔3%)。 3.期末報告30%(創新設計10%，口頭報告10%（表達5%,內容製作5%），書面報告五個部分10%， 每個部分佔2%)。 4.期末考10%(加分題,問答題10題,每題1分) 。"
